description: Supports any skill that hits enemies or inflicts ailments

mods.text: Supported Skills have % increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
Supported Skills deal % increased Damage while you are affected by an Ailment
Supported Skills deal % increased Damage with Ailments

mods: Supported Skills have (35–54)% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
Supported Skills deal (25–34)% more Damage with Ailments
Supported Skills have (25–34)% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments on Enemies
name: Unbound Ailments Support
